title: Hotel Les Barmes De L’Ours: Ski the French Alps
description: Navigate the slopes of the number one ski resort in the world, Val d'Isère in the French Alps, staying at the five-star Hotel Les Barmes De L’Ours - a Relais & Châteaux property complete with a Michelin-starred restaurant. Your five-night stay includes daily breakfasts, nightly three-course dinners, a welcome beer or wine or arrival and savings on ski gear rental and spa treatments for two adults.

title: Five-Star Parisian Elegance Minutes from Eiffel Tower
description: Soak up the sights of Paris staying just minutes from the Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs-Élysées at the five-star Sofitel Paris Baltimore Tour Eiffel. Boasting an exceptional location, this grand historic hotel was designed in collaboration with Gustave Eiffel himself. Enjoy a romantic four-day/three-night getaway with daily breakfasts, a complimentary French charcuterie platter and a bottle of French wine on arrival for only $999 for two adults, valued up to $2,360.
location_description: Sofitel Paris Baltimore Tour Eiffel [201042] Sofitel Paris Baltimore Tour Eiffel Escapes

title: Five-Star Sofitel Escape in Paris
description: Experience quintessential Parisian style in the heart of the city at the five-star Hotel Paris Bastille Boutet - MGallery by Sofitel. Located away from the busy tourist areas in the city's trendy Bastille neighbourhood, the hotel offers a genuine Parisian experience while being within easy reach of the city's main attractions including the Louvre Museum, Notre Dame and the River Seine. Enjoy a three-night stay including daily buffet breakfasts, a glass of wine each, a delicious French charcuterie plate to share and more for only $899 for two adults, valued up to $2,166. Watch the video below.

title: Marriott Luxury in Romantic Paris: AC Hotel Paris Porte Maillot
description: Enjoy a stylish city escape in the world capital of romance, staying at AC Hotel Paris Porte Maillot, part of the international Marriott collection. Your five-night stay includes daily breakfasts, a VIP champagne welcome, a complimentary ticket each for a cruise on the River Seine and a welcome drink with French charcuterie and cheese.

title: Sofitel Luxury in the South of France
description: Discover the beautiful Provencal coastline with a five-star escape to France’s port city of Marseille. Spend four days/three nights at the chic Sofitel Marseille Vieux Port and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a delightful welcome cocktail on the terrace overlooking the famous Vieux-Port of Marseille, entry for two to the MUCEM Museum, discounts on spa treatments and dining and more. Only $899 for two adults, valued up to $1,874.

title: Five-Star Paris, Moments from the Arc de Triomphe
description: Soak up the romance of the City of Light, staying right in the centre of town at the five-star Renaissance Paris Arc de Triomphe Hotel by Marriott. This superbly located hotel, part of Marriott’s luxury Renaissance collection, is just a short walk from the famed Arc de Triomphe. Stay for four nights in a Deluxe Guest Room with daily breakfasts, a complimentary two-course dinner at the hotel’s à la carte restaurant, bottle of French wine, museum entry and more for just $799 per person (twin share), valued up to $2,900 for two adults. title: Experience Classic Parisian Elegance Mere Minutes from the Louvre
description: Discover the magic of Paris from the intimate and stylish Le Pradey Hotel, conveniently located at the edge of the Tuileries Garden and just minutes from the world-famous Louvre Museum. Visit world-famous landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower, the Champs-Élysées, the Arc de Triomphe, Notre Dame and more on a four-day/three-night city break. Enjoy daily breakfasts, a ticket to the Louvre Museum each and a delicious VIP treat on arrival for just $799 for two adults, valued up to $1,731.

title: Unique Boutique Escape in the Heart of Paris
